title: spack assumes partial downloads are complete
body:
If a file of the correct name exists, spack assumes the download is complete.  As a result, interrupted downloads cause subsequent install requests to fail rather than attempt to resume or retry the download:

```
rzalastor1@scogland:spack install -v llvm@3.7.0
==> Installing llvm
==> python is already installed in /g/g12/scogland/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.9.2/python-2.7.11-tnnb5474rktee6vfl5ffmefvlbqgrqfa.
==> ncurses is already installed in /g/g12/scogland/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.9.2/ncurses-6.0-2v7r63atwq6aw3p66bc3mkp7hxeoxgqx.
==> Installing swig
==> pcre is already installed in /g/g12/scogland/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.9.2/pcre-8.38-qehu2lt63bbtou3oxh2eflua2o4u5osz.
==> Trying to fetch from http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/swig/swig-3.0.2.tar.gz
#                                                                          1.6%^C
==> Error: Keyboard interrupt.
rzalastor1@scogland:spack install -v llvm@3.7.0
==> Installing llvm
==> python is already installed in /g/g12/scogland/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.9.2/python-2.7.11-tnnb5474rktee6vfl5ffmefvlbqgrqfa.
==> ncurses is already installed in /g/g12/scogland/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.9.2/ncurses-6.0-2v7r63atwq6aw3p66bc3mkp7hxeoxgqx.
==> Installing swig
==> pcre is already installed in /g/g12/scogland/spack/opt/spack/chaos_5_x86_64_ib/gcc-4.9.2/pcre-8.38-qehu2lt63bbtou3oxh2eflua2o4u5osz.
==> Already downloaded /g/g12/scogland/spack/var/spack/stage/swig-3.0.2-i67shydfa46bm24nz5nb2sfnitaarhor/swig-3.0.2.tar.gz.
==> Error: md5 checksum failed for /g/g12/scogland/spack/var/spack/stage/swig-3.0.2-i67shydfa46bm24nz5nb2sfnitaarhor/swig-3.0.2.tar.gz.
Expected 62f9b0d010cef36a13a010dc530d0d41 but got 92bba45c02b616b68900af861c0ee0e0.
```
